Class playn.core.Platform

Changed from an interface to a class.

Added Constructors
Platform()  
 

Removed Methods
Keyboard keyboard()  
Mouse mouse()  
Pointer pointer()  
float random()  
void run(Game)  
void setErrorReporter(ErrorReporter)  
void setLifecycleListener(LifecycleListener)  
void setPropagateEvents(boolean)  
Touch touch()  
 

Added Methods
void dispatchEvent(Signal<E>, E) Dispatches {@code event} on {@code signal} and catches any error that propagates out of the event dispatch, reporting it via .reportError.
Exec exec() Returns the Exec service.
Input input() Returns the Input service.
void invokeAsync(Runnable) @deprecated Use Exec.invokeAsync.
boolean isAsyncSupported() @deprecated Use Exec.isAsyncSupported.
 

Changed Methods
void invokeLater(Runnable) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Now deprecated.
 Use {@link Exec#invokeLater}.
void reportError(String, Throwable) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Called when a backend (or other framework code) encounters an exception that it can recover from, but which it would like to report in some orderly fashion.
 

Added Fields
Signal<Error> errors Any errors reported via .reportError will be emitted to this signal in addition to being logged.
Signal<Platform> frame This signal will be emitted at the start of every frame after the platform is started.
Signal<Lifecycle> lifecycle A signal emitted with lifecycle events.
